amendment.description: Amendment redirects $16 million from funding for Department of the Interior salaries and expenses to the Payment in Lieu of Taxes program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to redirect $16 million in funding to PILT accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cannon amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Cannon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cannon amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
